data.text: Those who separate themselves from other people think only about those things that they are interested in;
Foolish people do not want to understand anything;
Whenever people do wicked things, others will despise them;
What wise people say is like a deep ocean that you can never get to the bottom of [MET],
It is not good for a judge to decide matters in favor of those who ◄are guilty/have done wicked things►
When foolish people [SYN] start arguments,
What foolish people [MTY] say causes them to be ruined;
People enjoy listening to what gossips say like [SIM] they enjoy tasty food;
People who are lazy while they work
Yahweh [MTY] is like a strong tower [MET];
Rich people are protected because they have a lot of money [PRS]
Proud people are on the road to being ruined,
Those who reply to someone before that person has finished speaking are foolish;
A desire to continue to live can sustain someone when he is sick;
Intelligent people are always wanting to learn more;
If you take a gift to an important person, that will open the way to allow you to talk to him.
The first person to present his case in court seems right,
If two influential/important people are arguing,
If you help relatives, they will protect you like [SIM] a strong wall protects a city,
People are happy when they hear others say [MTY] something that is good,
What you say can cause others to be killed or it can cause them to continue to live;
If you marry a good woman, that is like finding a wonderful thing;
It is necessary for poor people to speak politely when they request rich people to do something for them,
There are some people who only pretend to be friends with us,
